name: ModifyInterviewEnvironment
description:
Partially update a user interview environment.

Use this tool to apply partial updates to a specific user interview environment within a project. This helps in modifying certain attributes of the environment without altering the entire setup.

parameters.name: user_interview_id
parameters.description: A UUID string that uniquely identifies the user interview to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this user interview.

parameters.name: target_project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Obtain by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: user_interview_update_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing updates for the user interview environment. Include fields like 'id', 'created_by', 'created_at', 'interviewee_emails', 'transcript', 'summary', and 'audio' for partial updates.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this user interview.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this user interview.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
